events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in days and I am concerned about the delay.
System classified the issue as a delivery delay after detecting keywords related to shipping and late arrival.
Support agent Anna has been assigned to handle the delayed delivery report from the customer.
Hello! I’m Anna from customer support, and I’m here to help you with your delayed package issue. Could you please provide your order number?
Agent requests order number and any other tracking details to investigate the shipping delay.
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The last tracking update was five days ago and it says the package is still in transit.
I’ve contacted the shipping carrier for a status update and can offer a refund on shipping fees if the item doesn’t arrive within three more days.
Thank you for your quick reply and the shipping fee refund offer. I appreciate your help and will wait the additional three days.
The package has now been delivered successfully. We have also processed the refund for the shipping fees as promised.
Just checking in to make sure you received your order and everything is in good condition. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding during the delay.
